snippet: In 1909, The Paris Herald told a tale of equality on London’s new skating rinks.
abstract: In 1909, The Paris Herald told a tale of equality on London’s new skating rinks.
lead_paragraph: Society news was a longstanding feature of the European edition. Reports on the high society of capital cities often filled several pages. Stationed at popular resorts during the holiday season, the Herald’s reporters told colorful tales of elegant festivities and sporting events.
